title: Keep Your Pet Warm
description: Provide cozy blankets or heated beds to keep your pet warm during cold months.

title: Dress Them Warmly
description: For pets with thin or short fur, use warm clothes, especially in cold weather.

title: Groom Regularly
description: Brush your pet regularly so their coat stays healthy and retains warmth.

title: Provide Proper Nutrition
description: Feed nutritious food during winter to keep your pets energetic and healthy.
